text: Silvano Garay Ulloa (born 10 February 1959) is a Mexican politician from the Labor Party. From 2006 to 2009 he served as Deputy of the LX Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing the State of Mexico. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:People from San Luis Potosí Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Labor Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Silvano Garay Ulloa
